text: On skazal: "O narod moy! Skazhite mne, yesli ya polnost'yu i soznatel'no otdayu sebe yasnyy otchot v tom, k chemu ya vas prizyvayu, opirayas' na ochevidnoye dokazatel'stvo ot moyego Gospoda, i On Svoyey milost'yu vybral menya poslannikom i prorokom, to kak ya mogu v ugodu vam oslushat'sya Yego i ne povinovat'sya Yemu, ne peredav Yego Poslaniya? Kto zashchitit menya ot nakazaniya, yesli ya oslushayus' Allakha? Vy ne smozhete zashchitit' menya ot Yego nakazaniya. Yesli ya povinuyus' vam i oslushayus' moyego i vashego Gospoda, to vy tol'ko nanesote mne bol'shoy uron
